("entity"<|>"Cahier de Doléances"<|>"Contribution"<|>"Cahier de Doléances is a citizen contribution document in the context of the Grand Débat National, expressing collective grievances and opinions.")##
("entity"<|>"20/02/2019"<|>"Date"<|>"The date refers to February 20, 2019, when the contribution was recorded.")##
("entity"<|>"pisciculteur d’étang"<|>"ActeurInstitutionnel"<|>"pisciculteur d’étang represents a professional involved in fish farming, highlighting issues regarding the management of aquatic environments.")##
("entity"<|>"services de l'État"<|>"ActeurInstitutionnel"<|>"services de l'État refers to government services and institutions responsible for the regulatory framework surrounding environmental management.")##
("entity"<|>"ressource en eau"<|>"Thematique"<|>"ressource en eau refers to water resources, emphasizing the importance of water management policies and their impact on biodiversity and ecosystems.")##
("entity"<|>"milieux aquatiques"<|>"Thematique"<|>"milieux aquatiques refers to aquatic environments, emphasizing their importance in biodiversity and requiring proper management to sustain their quality.")##
("entity"<|>"certification PEFC"<|>"Proposition"<|>"certification PEFC is a proposed incentive measure from the forestry sector that could be applied to aquatic environments to promote sustainable management.")##
("entity"<|>"cormoran"<|>"ServicePublic"<|>"cormoran refers to a type of bird impacting biodiversity in aquatic environments, highlighting the ecological issues discussed in the contribution.")##
("entity"<|>"taxe ADAR"<|>"ReformeFiscale"<|>"taxe ADAR is a form of tax on the revenue of fish farming operations that is seen as excessive and disconnected from actual benefits.")##
("entity"<|>"MSA"<|>"ActeurInstitutionnel"<|>"MSA refers to the agricultural social mutual society which sometimes fails to differentiate adequately between professional benefits and individual income.")##
("entity"<|>"déclarations administratives"<|>"Doleance"<|>"déclarations administratives refers to the multiple administrative declarations that create complexity and inefficiencies for the contributors.")##
("entity"<|>"nouveau contrôle technique"<|>"Proposition"<|>"nouveau contrôle technique is a proposed measure affecting older vehicles used for professional purposes and the economic impact on small structures.")##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Doléances"<|>"pisciculteur d’étang"<|>"The contribution highlights issues specific to the pisciculteur d’étang, reflecting their professional experiences and concerns."<|>8)##
("relationship"<|>"services de l'État"<|>"ressource en eau"<|>"Government services are responsible for the management decisions that impact water resources, as lamented by the contributor."<|>9)##
